item.title: 2023-02-27-makeup-lecture
item.description:
Today’s (Monday, 27th of February) make-up lecture will be at the usual time (2:00 PM - 3:00 PM) in the usual room (LH4).

item.title: 2023-02-10-no-change-in-venue
item.description:
Today’s (10th of February) lecture and quiz will be held (offline) at the usual time in our usual lecture room because our lecture room is not among the three in LH that will be used for the MS22 examinations.


Last modified: 12:04 PM - 10 February, 2023
item.dc:creator: Shane D'Mello

item.title: 2023-02-05-quiz
item.description:
There will be a quiz on Friday, the 10th of February on everything covered after the first-mid-semester examination.
